original_text: Any of them could tell you that the Lord has done this. Any of them could tell you that the Lord has done this.
korean_text: 이것들 중에 어느 것이 여호와의 손이 이를 행하신 줄을 알지 못하랴

sentences.original_text: Any of them could tell you
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 누구도 당신에게 말해 줄 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord has done this
Any of them could tell you
